Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "add c16:uniqueId to several chart complex types" (#1767) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
Classes for the following complex types receive the `DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Office2016.Drawing.Charts.UniqueID` (`c16:uniqueId`) extension child: 
`CT_DLbl`, `CT_LineSer`, `CT_ScatterSer`, `CT_RadarSer`, `CT_BarSer`, `CT_AreaSer`, `CT_PieSer`, `CT_BubbleSer`, `CT_SurfaceSer`

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "`pictureOptions` and `bubble3D` were removed from some complex types in O15 but not the SDK" (#1769) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
Need to `[Obsolete]` the following: 

`pictureOptions` from `CT_LineSer`, `CT_RadarSer`, `CT_PieSer`, `CT_BubbleSer` and `CT_SurfaceSer`
`bubble3D` from `CT_SurfaceSer`

these children have been removed in the O15 Office schemas but were never removed from the SDK.

Once obsoleted, they will be marked for deletion in the next major release.

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Add c16:uniqueId for CT_DPt and CT_LegendEntry" (#1768) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
Add the following c16:uniqueId extension child patches:

CT_DPtExtensionList/CT_DPtExtension
CT_LegendEntryExtensionList/CT_LegendEntryExtension

These are already in the O16 patch file on the backend, just uncomment for v4.0.

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Documentation Request: Explain how to "Splitting up (shredding) a file into multiple files, and combining multiple files into a single file."" (#1764) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
**Describe the API or scenario**
One of the first features listed in this repo is:

"Splitting up (shredding) a file into multiple files, and combining multiple files into a single file."

But I can't find any information on the internet on how to split a file into multiple files using this SDK.

**Attempts**
Googled it

**Related scenarios**
All these questions but no code answers:

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/43659785/openxml-word-document-split
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/43659785/openxml-word-document-split
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/4920532/how-to-split-a-word-document-by-section-using-c-sharp-and-the-open-xml-sdk

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "c16:uniqueID element has wrong case" (#1762) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
**Describe the bug**
When writing out the c16:uniqueId element using the UniqueID class
```xml
<c:ser>
    ...
    <c:extLst>
        <c:ext xmlns:c16="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/drawing/2014/chart"
               uri="{C3380CC4-5D6E-409C-BE32-E72D297353CC}">
            <c16:uniqueID val="{00000000-2153-43F5-A17B-C2679033F518}" />
        </c:ext>
    </c:extLst>
</c:ser>
```

**Observed behavior**
`c16:uniqueID` is written

**Expected behavior**
`c16:uniqueId` should be written

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - DocumentFormat.OpenXml Version: 3.0.2
